function.name: trim
function.description: Returns the trimmed version of string text. If the optional boolean parameter internal is set to true, the routine will also replace slack white space inside the string with a single space.

examples.example: log(trim(" Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio ")); log(trim(" Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio ", true));
Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio

example.description: Trim the data read from a file:
